content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with Let George Do It this week. We hear Vultures On The Wing, his story from May 9, 1949.

(30:12) Matthew Slade, Private Investigator closes this episode with Passage To Tangiers, his broadcast from November 8, 1964.

Download CaseClosed780

Visit donate.relicradio.com for more information on how you can support Case Closed. Your help keeps this show coming every week! Thank you.
